channel.title: linocut on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in linocut on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Torino
item.description: I printed my last practice print yesterday before heading to Lincoln.

item.title: Tower
item.description: I was in the studio last week, printing a new piece, the Tower Theater.
Back in the studio this weekend, experimenting with graphite ink from Gamblin.

item.title: Draft Work: “Fast Pass”
item.description: Fast Pass, copyright 2013 Nathan Yergler 3” x 5” two plate linocut print Last week when I was printing my line study, I had a couple extra hours in the studio.

item.title: Coffee Cup line study
item.description: Untitled (coffee cup line study), copyright 2013 Nathan Yergler 4” x 5” linocut print

item.title: New Work: “Candlestick Point”
item.description: “Candlestick Point”, copyright 2013 Nathan Yergler 8” x 10” linocut print, printed on Magnani Pescia A dear friend sent me a photograph she took from Candlestick Point shortly after I made a print of a canal in Amsterdam.

item.title: New Work: “Welcome Home”
item.description: “Welcome Home”, copyright 2013 Nathan Yergler 5” x 7” two plate linocut print, printed on Rives BFK

item.title: New Work: Untitled (Bay Bridge)
item.description: “Untitled (Bay Bridge)”, copyright 2013, Nathan Yergler 8” x 10” four plate linocut print, printed on Rives BFK

item.title: “Golden Gate”, Linocut Print with Watercolor
item.description: “Golden Gate”, copyright 2013, Nathan Yergler 8” x 10” linocut print with watercolor, printed on Rives BFK

item.title: New Work: Days Getting Shorter
item.description: “Days Getting Shorter”, copyright 2013, Nathan Yergler 8” x 10” Two Plate Linocut, printed on Rives BFK

item.title: Debugging my Creative Process
item.description: I’ve been taking print making classes this year, and have really enjoyed exploring something new.
